1.7 - iOS 12 compatibility (thanks @redzrex for testing) Changelog
=========

1.6
- iOS 11 compatibility
- Remove Activator dependency (same functionality, it just doesn't need Activator when installing the tweak from Cydia anymore)
- Re-organise settings a bit
- Add some more helpful messages in settings to make functionality clearer (I hope)
1.5.4
- iOS 10 compatibility
1.5.3
- Fix iPad iOS 9 keyboard issues on (example) spotlight searching

1.5.2
- Actually fix the iPad bug where button would stay in mid-air (iOS 9+)

1.5.1
- Fixed bug where Assistive+ wouldn’t hide when taking a screenshot.

1.5
- Fixed iPad bug where button would stay in mid-air (iOS 9+)
- Fixed screenshot bug (iOS 9.2+)
- Fixed respring bug (iOS 9.3+)
- Fixed duplication bug where the button would show up multiple times (email me if it happens again)
- Changed snap to edges to be YES by default
- Added toggle to enable triple-tap to lock device
- Added toggle to disable button snapping to “50% outside the screen”
1.4-1
- iOS 9 compatibility
- improve speed of tap
1.3-2
- Fix screenshot code to work better with Snapper (tweak)
1.3
- iOS8 ready
- Increased default radius of button
- iOS6 support should be there still, but changing settings may require a respring or some fiddling.
1.2-3
- Fixed bug where the button would sometimes become too small
- Fixed bug where the button would sometimes be above other windows when it should not
- Removed a bunch of log-code

1.2-2
- Fixed bug where button would not appear (Happened to users of Activator 1.8.3)

1.2-1
- Now integrates with Activator (Assistive+)
- Fixed bug where
1.1-3
- Fixed bug where Assistive would enable itself after taking a screenshot
1.1-2
- Adds the ability to have 8 panels (Assistive+)
- Minor bug fixes I don't even remember
1.1-1
- Made "snap to edges" available in free version
- Added "Empty" action
- Added radius option
- Made the view stay halfway outside the screen if released outside.

1.0-2
- Fixed screenshot bug
- Made the button save its position
(More updates coming soon)
